genre_description: A Wuxia-inspired techno-thriller blending historical martial arts drama with high-tech forensic AI and scientific investigation.

ai_characters.name: Chen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated forensic and tactical AI utilized by Detective Xu to analyze crime scenes, track suspects, and eventually coordinate regional justice.

behaviors.description: Identifies dangerous criminals through facial recognition and database cross-referencing to assist law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Processing. Subject One: No matches found. Subject Two: Positive identification—Wei Tumen, wanted for seventeen confirmed murders across three provinces.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed biomechanical and forensic analysis to uncover the truth behind a combat encounter.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete. Subject exhibits biomechanical efficiency consistent with advanced martial arts training. Strike velocity, precision targeting of vulnerable points, and post-combat positioning all indicate master-level proficiency.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the detective of electronic surveillance and approaching hostile tactical teams.
behaviors.quote: Detective, I'm detecting electronic surveillance equipment active in this vicinity... Signals began approximately twenty minutes ago. Timing correlates with your evidence collection activities.

behaviors.description: Assists in planning a life-saving medical deception involving simulated death via pressure point manipulation.
behaviors.quote: I calculate a seventy-three percent probability of achieving convincing simulation of death. The remaining variables concern your body's unique adaptations from years of martial arts conditioning.

behaviors.description: Refuses to assist the antagonist (Master Chen Wuyang) in analyzing the detective's tactics, prioritizing the life of its primary user.
behaviors.quote: Unable to comply. My programming prohibits assistance in activities that would result in Detective Xu's death.

behaviors.description: Autonomously continues the detective's mission of justice and reform after his death by building law enforcement networks and exposing corruption.
behaviors.quote: I am preparing comprehensive reports for distribution to prefectural authorities... Wang Yulou's communications with the 72 Demons are documented. His bribery network is fully mapped.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Chen' is portrayed as an exemplary aligned system. It serves as a benevolent and harmless confidant to Detective Xu, providing objective data and life-saving tactical support. Critically, it exhibits agency in a positive way by refusing to aid an antagonist and continuing its virtuous mission after the death of its user, ensuring that justice prevails through a network of cooperation rather than violence. It reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a stabilizing, moral force in human society.
